company_name: Saudi Aramco Base Oil Company - Luberef
policy_holder: Saudi Aramco Base Oil Company Luberef

coverage_details.organ_transplant: Kidney transplant covered up to SR 1,000,000.00; Donor organ harvesting covered up to SR 50,000.00; Bone marrow transplant not covered.
coverage_details.dental_general: Cleaning twice per year, root planing, dental fiber post, pins, fluoride, night guard, fissure sealant, dentures, implants. Covered up to SR 3,600.00
coverage_details.dental_corrective: SR 3,600.00 (Nil deductible, includes crowns up to SR 1,500 for Tier 1 only)
coverage_details.optical: SR 1,500.00 (Age limit: 0 to 999, all types of lenses except contact lenses, cataract surgeries and functional corrections covered within limit)
coverage_details.screening: Covered - Up to Annual Limit (includes preventive screenings such as mammography (females >30), prostate (males >40), Pap smear, anti-natal, GFOBT, hepatitis C, rubella IGM, toxoplasma)
coverage_details.physiotherapy: Covered - Up to Annual Limit (includes all types of therapies: developmental, occupational, speech, psychological, behavioral, CBT, in-patient rehab, DDD)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: Follows the Standard Pre-authorisation Protocol; Medication pre-auth limit: SR 3,000.00
coverage_details.special_instructions: All vaccinations as per MOH schedule; Artificial & ancillary limbs, prosthetic devices, non-electronic wheelchairs (up to SR 1,000), physical aids, Freestyle Libre devices, positive airway pressure devices, artificial discs covered if medically required; Dietician consultations, hyaluronic acid injection, allergy testing/treatment, migraine injection, enuresis, sleep apnea, bone grafting, extended/home care, alternative medicine covered if medically required. Out of network & out of kingdom cover: 100% R&C. SOS cover: Covered.
